meanings.sent1: The movie's ending left everyone in awe.
meanings.sent2: I always cry at the ending of sad movies.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected ending of the magic show surprised everyone.
meanings.sent4: The ending of the book was like a sudden drop into darkness.
meanings.sent5: The beautiful sunset marked the ending of a perfect day.

meanings.sent1: The happy ending of the story made me smile.
meanings.sent2: Every journey has a beginning and an ending.
meanings.sent3: The ending of the party was signaled by the last song.
meanings.sent4: The ending of their friendship was like a door closing forever.
meanings.sent5: The ending of the race was a close finish between the two runners.

meanings.definition: The act of bringing something to an end.
meanings.sent1: The abrupt ending of the meeting surprised everyone.
meanings.sent2: She was responsible for the successful ending of the project.
meanings.sent3: The ending of the game was a tie, which was unexpected.
meanings.sent4: The ending of the argument brought peace to the room.
meanings.sent5: The gradual ending of the song left the audience wanting more.
